\documentclass[a4paper, 12pt]{report}

\input preprocessors/localization
\input preprocessors/packages
\input preprocessors/properties

\begin{document}

	%
	% Generate a thesis title page
	\maketitle


	%
	%	FRONT MATTER
	%
	\pagenumbering{roman}


	%
	% Include an auto-generated table of contents
	\tableofcontents
	\clearpage


	%
	%	MAIN MATTER
	%
	\pagenumbering{arabic}


	%
	% Includes all chapters
	\input chapters/01-introduction/chapter

\end{document}
